title: How to manage retirement plans as they pile up
contentencoded:
In 21st century America, jobs for life are rare.  For those lucky enough to have jobs with retirement plans, with the many jobs comes many retirement plans, which all send quarterly statements that need tracking. 

Paddy Hirsch, Marketplace's senior producer of personal finance, joins Morning Report host David Brancaccio to discuss the proliferation of these portfolios.
